children.text:
len_s, q, l, r, i
    integer, allocatable :: cum(:)

    read(*, '(a)') s
    len_s = len_trim(s)
    allocate(cum(0:len_s)) cum = 0
    cum(0) = 0
    cum(len_s) = 0
    do i = 1, len_s - 1
        if (s(i:i) == s(i+1:i+1)) then
            cum(i) = cum(i-1) + 1
        else
            cum(i) = cum(i-1)
        end if
    end do
    read(*, *) q do i = 1, q
        read(*, *) l, r
        r = r - 1
        print *, cum(r) - cum(l-1)
    end do
    deallocate(cum)
end program main

program main
    implicit none
    character(100000) :: s
    integer :: len_s, q, l, r, i
    integer, allocatable :: cum(:)

    read(*, '(a)') s
    len_s = len_trim(s)
    allocate(cum(0:len_s))
    cum = 0
    cum(0) = 0
    cum(len_s) = 0
    do i = 1, len_s - 1
        if (s(i:i) == s(i+1:i+1)) then
            cum(i) = cum(i-1) + 1
        else
            cum(i) = cum(i-1)
        end if
    end do
    read(*, *) q
    do i = 1, q
        read(*, *) l, r
        r = r - 1
        print *, cum(r) - cum(l-1)
    end do
    deallocate(cum)
end program main
